snippet: A suit filed in federal court says that Ms. Perry’s hit “Dark Horse” is derivative of the 2008 song “Joyful Noise” by Flame.
abstract: A suit filed in federal court says that Ms. Perry’s hit “Dark Horse” is derivative of the 2008 song “Joyful Noise” by Flame.

headline.main: Lawsuit Claims Katy Perry's 'Dark Horse' Borrows From Christian Rap Song
headline.print_headline: Katy Perry Is Named  In Lawsuit Over Song
